pci_projects_project_users_add_short_des: You can set access to your archives for your predefined users, or create new users and get your access keys.
pci_projects_project_users_add_success_m: The Object Storage credentials for the user {{user}} have been generated
pci_projects_project_users_add_error_mes: The Object Storage credentials for the user {{user}} could not be generated.
